name: Lava Game
description:
Collect the yellowish squares and don't get hit by the lava. I originally made it with competition in mind, but I think it works better as co-op.

1 - 2 players

Controller Required

  • Left Stick - Move
  • Right Stick - Aim
  • A - Jump
  • Right Trigger - Place Block
  • Left Trigger - Remove Block
  • Escape - Quit
  • "r" key - restart

This is a prototype for some mechanics that I may or may not develop further
